thread.title: U.S. Treasury official: G20 sees need to ‘double down’ against devaluation
thread.title_full: U.S. Treasury official: G20 sees need to ‘double down’ against devaluation

author: Expert
title: U.S. Treasury official: G20 sees need to ‘double down’ against devaluation
text:
Business News businessNews Expert 
ANKARA (Reuters) – There is a shared belief among the members of the Group of 20 leading economies in the need to “double down” against competitive currency devaluation and avoid it in both policy and language, a senior U.S. Treasury official said on Saturday.
